summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Vehicle Sales feature for ServisPro platform. All 16 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing confirmed all vehicle sales tabs and admin management features are working correctly.
seed_data_creation: Created test vehicle sales during pytest execution for testing approve/reject/sold flows
context_for_next_testing_agent: Vehicle Sales feature fully tested. Backend endpoints: POST /api/vehicle-sales, GET /api/vehicle-sales/my-sales, GET /api/admin/vehicle-sales, PUT /api/admin/vehicle-sales/{id}/approve, PUT /api/admin/vehicle-sales/{id}/reject, PUT /api/admin/vehicle-sales/{id}/sold all working. Frontend: Provider dashboard shows 'Mes Ventes' and '+ Vendre' tabs for vehicle providers (Voiture, Camionneur, Tracteur). Admin dashboard 'Ventes Véhicules' tab shows all sales with Approuver/Rejeter/Marquer vendu buttons.

backend_apis: GET /api/vehicle-sales - Public list of approved sales (200 OK)
GET /api/admin/vehicle-sales - Admin list all sales (200 OK)
frontend_provider_dashboard: 'Mes Véhicules' tab - visible for vehicle providers
'+ Ajouter Véhicule' tab - for rental vehicles
'Mes Ventes' tab - shows provider's vehicle sales with status
'+ Vendre' tab - vehicle sale form with fields: vehicle_type, brand, model, year, mileage, fuel_type, transmission, price, description, location, condition
frontend_admin_dashboard: 'Ventes Véhicules' tab - visible in admin dashboard
Summary cards: Ventes en attente, Ventes actives, Demandes en attente, Véhicules vendus
Sales list with status badges: En attente, Approuvé, Rejeté, Vendu
Details panel showing vehicle info, seller info, description
'Marquer vendu' button - visible for approved sales

mocked_apis_list: Mobile Money Orange/MTN - Payment integration is simulated
